posts.title: HTML tags you may not know about
posts.metaDesc: Modern HTML offers many HTML elements to make websites more accessible. In this blogpost I want to share a few lesser known HTML elements.

posts.title: Deploy static Next.js site to Github pages
posts.metaDesc: I have built my website using Next.JS and host it on Github pages. In this blogpost I will show how I have configured my github repository.

posts.title: Hello world
posts.metaDesc: My very first blogpost on my new website. This is the meta description to give a short introduction to this blog post.
